entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:41 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
